ISSUE.TITLE: Mini Shopping Cart Subtotal (with discount) is different from Shopping Cart Summary subtotal
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.6.3 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Create an Order that is subject for a Discount to be applied 2. Go to Cart page Sub-Total is shown without Discount: ![image](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/assets/3656411/2d66eb4d-0f15-4a15-bbf2-776d683c9d95) At the same time Mini Shopping Cart show's subtotal with Discount: ![image](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/assets/3656411/eea2707e-691c-4cc3-8c02-80047f7495f2) The issue is with the following file: https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Presentation/Nop.Web/Factories/ShoppingCartModelFactory.cs method name: PrepareMiniShoppingCartModelAsync The following line: ``` var (_, _, _, subTotalWithoutDiscountBase, _) = await _orderTotalCalculationService.GetShoppingCartSubTotalAsync(cart, subTotalIncludingTax); ``` Output value number 4 corresponds to `subTotalWithDiscountBase` for the following method: `GetShoppingCartSubTotalAsync` ``` Task<(decimal discountAmount, List<Discount> appliedDiscounts, decimal subTotalWithoutDiscount, decimal subTotalWithDiscount, SortedDictionary<decimal, decimal> taxRates)> GetShoppingCartSubTotalAsync(IList<ShoppingCartItem> cart, bool includingTax) ```

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #7063 Fix incorrect display of subtotal in mini shopping cart
